name: SynchroniCity (Ev1lbl0w)
description:
Solve traffic problems in a busy city!

You are a sophisticated AI tasked with fixing the traffic from this city! Prevent the chaos by changing traffic lights. It won't be easy, though!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys: Move camera while in-stage

Mouse and mouse buttons: Interact

Esc: Exit stage/game

This game is open-source (link at the end of the jam)
